chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 1
chapterSummaries.summary: The Beginning - The hero started their journey.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 2
chapterSummaries.summary: The First Lesson - The hero learned about honesty.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 3
chapterSummaries.summary: The Challenge - The hero faced their first challenge.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 4
chapterSummaries.summary: The Second Lesson - The hero learned about courage.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 5
chapterSummaries.summary: The Reflection - The hero reflected on their journey so far.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 6
chapterSummaries.summary: The Twist - The hero discovered a surprising truth.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 7
chapterSummaries.summary: The Third Lesson - The hero learned about friendship.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 8
chapterSummaries.summary: The Climax - The hero faced the final challenge.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 9
chapterSummaries.summary: The Fourth Lesson - The hero learned about perseverance.

chapterSummaries.title: Chapter 10
chapterSummaries.summary: The Adventure Concludes - The hero returned home with newfound wisdom.

educationalQuestions.question: What is the moral of the story?
educationalQuestions.explanation: The story teaches us that honesty leads to trust and friendship.
